entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 2000 metres in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023
